name: Planet Smasher
description: Like puzzles? Like explosions? Well then, let's smash some planets together... Play in 2D with keyboard and mouse, or turn it up to eleven and experience full-on planet smashing glory in Virtual Reality with the HTC Vive or Oculus Rift.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel® i3-2310M equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Play on a two dimensional square grid with a low spec PC (above requirements are for a 5 year old laptop which can run Planet Smasher with no issues)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or greater Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Play on a three dimensional cubic grid in Virtual Reality (above requirements are the minimum recommended for the HTC Vive / Oculus Rift)
